description: Autolav Galicia laundry self service

title: (27850) Viveiro - 9D Camiño Aceñas
description: Quiet parking next to the ITV with access to the coastal path. The lower area is quite flat but the upper area is uneven.

title: (27850) Viveiro - 1 Camino Veiga -Magazos
description: Quiet parking with almost no traffic, no services, with some easily corrected unevenness. There is an access to a very nice river walk that goes along the shore of the Landro river.

title: (27850) Viveiro - 41 Avenida Ferrol
description: Large and free parking. The market day is celebrated in it and you can not park. Perfect to spend the night and visit the center 300 m.

title: (27850) Vivero - 14K Avenida de Galicia
description: Free parking to visit Viveiro. There are many squares and it is 2 minutes from the center.

title: (27850) Viveiro - 1 Calle San Roque
description: Apardoiro amplo e gratuito dun mirador onde you see all Viveiro, with tables, barbecues, playground and a restaurant.

title: (27850) Vivero - 6 Avenida Ramón Canosa
description: Large car park very close to the center 2 minutes and next to a large supermarket is in the Club Náutico has no services or the possibility of filling the waters, ample parking for sightseeing and shopping next

title: (27850) Vivero - 24 Avenida Ramón Canosa
description: Laundry and Drying. Soap and softener included. Near the parking lot.

title: (27861) - Avenida Luis Cebreiro
description: Vacant motorhome area, filled

name: Camping Vivero
title: (27850) Camping Vivero
description: Camping in the town of Viveiro. There is an area for caravans and tents with natural shade of trees, and an area for motorhomes without shade but with large pitches (100 m2).

title: (27867) Viveiro - 1 Barrio Portochao
description: Very quiet place to sleep, eat, etc. Level, with tables and a small playground. There is also the beginning / end of a beautiful walk along the shore of the Landro river. On the other side, crossing the bridge, there is a fountain and a small jetty, comfortable for kayaks and for bathing in the river.

title: (27861) Vivero - 22 Avenida Cantarrana
description: Self-service laundry, washing and drying

title: (27867) Landrove - 3 LU-540
description: Quiet moi place next to dunha igrexa, asphalted and leveled. There is a tap with potábel water, a container of lixo, a playground and a small sports court.

title: (27863) Viveiro - Avenida Ramón Canosa
description: The parking of the local public swimming pool. next to the firefighters bombeiros

title: (27863) Cillero - LU-862
description:
Gas station with PROPANE CYLINDERS.
There is another Repsol gas station on the other side of town but they only have butane there. They told us that they had this one and so it was.

title: (27861) Lugo - 50D Rúa Suasbarras
description: Day parking, beach next door. What I do not know is if you can sleep. The beach has a shower and Lavapiés, next to a bar called Galipizza to eat a little of everything and at good prices.

title: (27863) Viveiro - 100 Calle Ramon Canosa
description: Parking on the dock of the port, nice place for lunch

title: (27866) Viveiro - 7 Lugar O Naseiro
description: Meadow and group of Eucalyptus next to the Ermida do Remedios de Naseiro. Next to the river Landro. Collect waste to continue enjoying these spaces

title: (27863) Viveiro - 6 Rúa Illa Gaveira
description: Cepsa service station where you can drain and refill water when filling with gasoline.

title: (27863) Viveiro - 45 Estrada da Area
description:
Parking both day and night.  Grass and trees area.  Very quiet and peaceful in nature.  There are no toilets, only the beach shower.  Services 2 min walk from the beach bar.  One of the best beaches in the area, a paradise with fine, clean sand and turquoise water.
 Restaurants and hotels around.  Supermarkets and others, 5 min away in Celeiro.  Surf beach (Esteiro) with surf school and waves of very good quality just 5 minutes by car.

title: (27861) Suegos - Unnamed Road
description:
Simple gravel parking lot of the Área singular cova da doncela.

Starting point for hikes to the caves. Further down the road there are also parts of an old port to visit (processed with jetties and viewing platforms)

5G reception given.

Access with our L2H2 without any problems. Very long vehicles may have trouble turning if the lot is full.

title: (27861) O Vicedo - 6 Lugar a Brela
description: Abrela beach is a parking on the beach among the pines with picnic area, and public toilets, quiet, beautiful tourist area !! The beach is very nice and very safe for children, restaurant "Choco" is a super nice guy, seafood and fish, the food is very good and cheap

title: (27877) Xove - 27 Terreno Parque Empresarial
description: Gas station with very low and convenient prices

title: (27879) - 11D Lugar O Loureiro
description: Esplanade in the middle of the forest with magnificent views, near the freida well with a 30m waterfall. At night we have been alone and a fox has even visited us :)

title: (27863) Faro - Unnamed Road
description: Small car park at Miradoiro do Monte Faro. Very quiet. Parking for 4/5 cars. Very quiet to spend the night. Incredible views.

title: (27861) Suegos - Os Corgos
description: You can park here to start the O Fuciño route. From here it is not possible to access with motorhomes. Until the car park and the place where the tickets are shown are 500 meters (then there is still another 500 m until the walkways start). We arrived early and had no problem parking.

title: () Xove - LU-P-2610
description: Good place to spend the night with access to a small beach. Not recommended for large vehicles. No services.

title: (27877) Xove - Unnamed Road
description: Parking 300 m behind the dunes. Possibility to spend the night in peace, there are fewer people around 8pm in summer. Dogs not allowed on the beach. Maximum 24 hours

title: (27879) Ventoselle - 17 Lugar Ventoselle
description: Small recreational area next to the Church, very quiet, a river runs very close, it has a fountain with drinking water (08-07-2021), tables and a grill to make a barbecue. The prao is flat in some area. Good land access very few meters.

title: (27877) Xove - 1A Lugar Prada
description: Area of loading and unloading by generosity of Parrillada os Faroles. Near the Esteiro beach.

title: (27861) O Vicedo - Playa de San Roman
title_short: (27861) O Vicedo - Playa de San Roman
description: Good place! Restaurant inexpensive and very good kitchen. Beach 30m away. From here you can do the Fuciño do Porco route, great hike please google it. Place on meadow and absolutely quiet. PU available. showers on the beach. Just great the place with the service. Especially the sea and the rocks are very impressive.

title: (27877) Vilachá -
description: A small site at the end of a dirt road on the coastal path. A nice view. Room for 1 or 2 vehicles so as not to be on top of each other and to leave parking space but also to turn around for fishermen and other walkers. The land is not flat.

title: (27861) O Vicedo - 66 Lugar O Cruceiro
description: By the side of the road, perfect for a picnic with a view! Space to park and several tables + benches with a beautiful view of the cliffs. A small trash can.

title: (27877) Portocelo - 2D Lugar Portocelo
description:
The place is a bit hard to find. Keep going slightly west and dont trust your navigation system. Our phones lost the connection steadily.

As you arrive, you'll see a green field with a parking sign. Use that instead of the driveway mentioned on the pictures. Its a part of the house which is habitated. Toilettes and showers are only opened during daytime. Drinking water is working day and night.

We spend a magnificient evening at the small beach in the bay all alone. Dont leave food outside as we saw a wild hog stumbling around the beach by night.

Beautyful spot in a very small town!
Guardia civil passed by next morning, while breakfast but didnt stop.

title: (27877) Portocelo - 8 Lugar Portocelo
description:
Grassy parking lot, beautiful corner, small beach without waves, small port.
No noise.

title: (27878) Xove - 2 Lugar O Cruceiro
description: Picnic area, tables and benches.

title: (27865) Ourol - 1 Ourol
description: Motorhome area in the town of Ourol. Next to recreation area with picnic tables, children's play area and town swimming pool. Lit overnight. No height restrictions. Parking is sloped - chocks required. Free electricity (shuko plug).

title: (27876) Portocelo - Unnamed Road
description: Nice location on a cliff top viewpoint. With beautiful views there is a walking route to take along the cliffs. We did not see anyone and had a wonderfully quiet night along the cliffs, a beautiful 4x4 path runs.

title: (27860) O Vicedo - 17 Aldea Vilasuso
description: Small car park along a road almost not frequented. Great views and picnic tables. Quiet and easy, for a possible night. No toilet or shower.

title: (15337) Manón - CP-4401
description: Picnic area, with running water. It can be reached with a large motorhome

title: (27877) Xove - Unnamed Road
description: Roncadoira lighthouse car park. Arrive in the evening after 8 p.m. Dead end road. Great view of the ocean but sometimes windy. If there is no space, go back on the road for 800 m and take a path on the right. Same view but with less wind.

title: (27876) - 34 Lugar O Alto de Lago
description: The beach is flat like in the Caribbean with white sand in a dock area. At night no car is very very quiet here. There is also a place where you can jump into the sea 3 meters high. Perfect for kayak and paddle. Toilets and showers are closed at 8:30 p.m., outdoor shower 24 hours a day. Ideal for nerves that need rest... 12.08.23 the water was closed due to water shortage...

title: (15337) Manón - 1 Lugar Barbeita
description: Parking by the river. They call it the sports center because there is a grass soccer field and a basketball and soccer field (all a bit neglected) plus an area for tables and a playground. No noise at night. The access road is narrow but you can enter with AC. Of course, at the end of the tour you will have a few blocks on the roof.

title: (27876) Morás - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent spot, with a breathtaking view! Access by a small path but passable for vans. There is room for a van or maybe 2. A hiking path goes through the spot

title: (27860) O Vicedo - 2 Aldea Baltar
description: ACV 08/19/18 BBB Playa de Xilloi, small beautiful beach. For ACs large few seats. In summer there is a very nice bar / restaurant with rich food and sea views. He sleeps wonderfully.

title: (27860) O Vicedo - 4 Camiño a Praia Fomento
title_short: (27860) O Vicedo - 4 Camiño a Praia Fomento
description: Nice place to spend the night. There is a beach bar next door to have a drink, but we had no problem with noise. We liked the views. You can take a walk around the port, where there is another beach bar. Nearby services: supermarket, pharmacy.

title: (27876) Xove - LU-P-2602
description: Quiet area, unserviced, with beach and fishing area

title: (27890) Cervo - 23 Rua Bidueiros
description:
In front of the Olympic pool of Cervo.
place to make a stop, quiet, although at night there is some noise from Alcoa.

title: (27860) O Vicedo - 27 Aldea Vilasuso
description: vantage point. Quiet and secluded. Can only be reached with ground clearance. A bit windy.

title: (27861) O Vicedo - 1 Avenida Arealonga
description: Unofficial parking on the beach with space for about 10 vehicles. Only suitable for campers or short mobile homes. Attention! Access via extended shoulder at the roadside. Beach shower and garbage bin at the place. Benches a few meters in the woods along the beach path. Huge sandy beach with tall pines right up to the beach. We stood here in early July for one night, all by ourselves and without disturbance.

title: (27860) O Vicedo - 41 Rúa do Porto
description: We had dinner at the chiringuito next door with good scallops and next door there is a nice beach. Any noise. The Civil Guard passed by and didn't tell us anything and that we were chatting with other companions in the motorhome. He has no service. The landscape of the port and O barqueiro in the background is magnificent.

title: (27876) - 33 Lugar O Portiño
description: Outdoor shower on the beach and drinking water tap. There are also some closed showers that open in the afternoon. It is a nice place with a picnic area, next to the beach of Morás.

title: (27860) O Vicedo - 1 Rúa do Porto
description: Esplanade with space for 5 vans. Quiet nearby road. The path to go down to Caolin beach is 100 meters away.

title: (27876) Lugo - 8T Lugar O Portiño
description: Beautiful place, super quiet and a bit isolated but very safe. You sleep with the sound of the sea in the background. Perfect access for motorhomes. There is an industrial port that works all night but you can hardly hear it. It is recommended to climb the mountain in front, it has a beautiful cliff on the other side.

title: (27861) O Vicedo - AC-862
description: Nice parking spot the road nearby is a little annoying but for one night ok. The beach is nearby also other spots are in walking distance with a beach shower.

title: (27876) Xove -
description: Land clearing with beautiful views of the Cliffs of Paper. In the middle of Nature, it is NOT a camping area, only a beautiful place to spend the night and sunrise.

title: (27890) San Cibrao - 17 Avenida da Mariña
description: New self-service laundry with all services

title: (27890) San Cibrao - 23 Avenida da Mariña
description: 3 double beach showers, along the walkway.

title: (27890) San Cibrao - 10 Rúa Manuel Antonio
description:
Impressive motorhome area, in a place chosen to please visitors, sea views, grass and only 300 meters from the town center where there are bars, restaurants and shops. Highly recommended.

Thanks to the people of San Cibrao for this ACs Area, and its water and lighting services.

title: (15337) Porto do Barqueiro - 5 Lugar Estacion
description: Parking to visit O Barqueiro next to the train station with access by a path to the port and town center. Unable to access town in AC

title: (15337) O Barqueiro - 1 Avenida Muelle
description: Parking in the port of O Barqueiro, very nice and quiet with several bars nearby.  it is very close to the entire Estaca de Bares area.

title: (15337) Porto do Barqueiro - 35 Rúa de Don Federico Maciñeira y Pardo de Lama
title_short: (15337) Porto do Barqueiro - 35 Rúa de Don Federico Maciñeira y Pardo de Lama
description: Free municipal parking to visit the port .. very sloping ... just for the visit. Access to the port prohibited by vehicle. If you cannot enter directly, continue uphill and turn around on the pseudo roundabout at the top from the coast. ditto to exit the car park

address.street: 35 Rúa de Don Federico Maciñeira y Pardo de Lama

title: (27890) Cervo - 3 Carretera do Faro
description: Municipal toilets and showers next to the beach (cold water).

title: (27890) Cervo - 46 Carretera do Faro
description:
Quiet place to spend and sleep in the San Cibrao lighthouse.
Always respecting the place and not removing tables or chairs.

title: (27890) Cervo - 165 Terreno Parque Empresarial Cuiña
description: Ample parking next to the coast. Very calm. No services. The entrance is through the street next to the Cervo Funeral Home.

title: (27891) Cervo - Carretera General Espineirido
description: Neighborhood service station also has a small shop and sell gas bottles

title: (15337) O Vicedo - Rua Rafael Campillo
description:
White sand beach accessed by stairs with space for two campers.
Access is tight for a large AC.
Although the place is lonely, it is worth it if it is what you are looking for.
The only sign that is indicated is that you have to leave space to access service vehicles.
Just to the left, among the ferns, there is a path that leads to a cove that is difficult to access but beautiful.

title: (15339) Capela de San Antón - Unnamed Road
title_short: (15339) Capela de San Antón - Unnamed Road
description:
Picnic area with barbecue and tables in the middle of nature, a beautiful view of the surrounding hills, there are various marked hiking trails
Easy to reach for any vehicle
4g coverage

title: (27891) Cervo - 176 Carretera General Espineirido
description: Stone tables and benches with good shade and fountain with water at the foot of the road. About 8-10 car parks, without services.

title: (27891) As Fábricas - 5 Agregado Sargadelos
description:
Car park in the historic complex of Sargadelos, located behind the old stables. Although the squares are narrow, motorhomes can be parked on the sides without problems. To get there, you have to pass the first car park and turn right after passing the stables (there is a sign for "Aparcadoiro").
Ideal parking to visit the historic complex of Sargadelos, here with the natural setting that surrounds it. There are no places reserved for motorhomes, all that is to park without problems.

title: (15337) O Porto de Bares - 1 Rúa Praia
title_short: (15337) O Porto de Bares - 1 Rúa Praia
description: Sloping parking on the Bares port. 3 restaurants open til end October. Pretty beach. Access by the small village, narrow, but it's ok. no overnight stay

title: (27891) As Fábricas - 2 Agregado Sargadelos
description: Parking next to old Sargadelos factories. There is a picnic area. Beginning of the Paseo dos Namorados. There is a fount. Area to park about 8 vehicles. Very quiet at night. No trouble sleeping.

title: (15337) O Porto de Bares - 1 Rúa Feliciano Armada
title_short: (15337) O Porto de Bares - 1 Rúa Feliciano Armada
description: Parking in grass, no services, nice bar, emerald beach, beautiful and protected from the winds! be careful to respect the long red light that allows you to cross the narrow village. spent without pb in the H2.78m and L6,00m range

title: (27891) Cervo - 105 Estrada a Sargadelos
description: Parking for visiting the Sargadelos factory in operation and the small museum.

title: (27777) O Valadouro - Unnamed Road
description: Easy access although it would not hurt to prune on both sides of the road, beautiful and quiet place to spend the night, during the day it has splendid views, where you park is countryside, pure nature, there are tables and a grill, you can do a hiking route to see, a dolmen, field of chantas, Tórez waterfall

title: (15337) Manón -
description: Parking of the beach, free, very calm and quiet, in the high season better go check the available space before going down with the vehicle because the turn can be difficult.

title: (15339) Ortigueira - 3 Lugar Estrada
description: In the middle of the village. Feels save. Ok for one night.

title: (15337) Manón - 1 Lugar Sabaido
description: 2 water sources

title: (15337) Manón - 2 Lugar Sabaido
description: Huge beach parking, there are many vans and motorhomes. it is paved and has a drinks stand and a snack bar. The parking is on the beach. (Blue flag beach) Besides, there is a very simple path of less than 4km with incredible views that goes to "the best bank in the world". excellent place to spend the night.

title: (15337) Manón - 7 Lugar Pumar Vale
description: Very quiet place to spend the night, from here starts a beautiful route that runs along the cliffs. It is not an area but it is possible to refill water. You can no longer enter with vehicles over 190 cm high, they have put a wood that limits the entrance in height, but you can camp (ideal for vans) both in the back of the campi g and just before the wood with height limit. The men's bathroom is always open, the women's bathroom is necessary to ask for the key at the bar. The showers are always open, they are individual and have cold water, but they are quite dirty.

title: (15339) Ortigueira - CP-6104
description: Parking at the end of the dirt road. we didn't spend the night but I think it's possible, flat enough and no signs. close to the beach and with spectacular views just around the corner.

title: (15339) Ortigueira - 11 Lugar Picon
description: 100m from the main car park, isolated spot for 1 or 2 trucks or motorhomes, just above the beach which is accessed by stairs. Breathtaking view and tranquility.

title: (15339) Ortigueira - Praia do Picón
description: Camino al Banco the most beautiful place in the world. In the cliffs of Loiba. In front of a Chiringuito. Without any service. No light. Looking at the awesome sea. Gravel soil without leveling.

title: (15339) Céltigos - AC-862
description: Picnic area on the side of the road. The trees cover the noise of the cars a lot. It has a playground, picnic tables and plenty of shade.

title: (15337) Manón - 6 Lugar Faro Estaca Bares
description: Beautiful views of the sea. Absolute privacy and a beautiful sunrise. 1.5 km to the most northerly point of Spain. Interesting ruins in the immediate vicinity.

title: (15339) Loiba -
description: Banco de Loiba - absolutely stunning views from the cliffs, with a big, today, open area to park.  Gravel road to access.

title: (15337) Manón - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the lighthouse of Bares, free, magnificent site. For amateurs of large spaces not afraid of the wind. no service.

title: (27880) Burela - 139-1 Estrada Marosa
description: Good parking in front of the football field. Almost no unevenness, very straight. There is a drinking fountain and a park for children. People have come to the soccer field to train and even so, not a whistle or a scream has been heard ... very very quiet. In front of the sea. Good access to go down to the beach. It must be a good area for angling because yesterday afternoon it was full of fishermen.

title: (27880) Burela - Unnamed Road
description: Level parking with good views. Very calm. Recreational area with tables and barbecues

title: (27880) Burela - 32 Carretera Marosa
description: Free parking behind the stadium, on the edge of the ocean, almost flat. No service. Walk along the seafront to the village.

title: (27837) Muras - 22 Viveiro
description: Quiet place, the area is fenced, you enter without problems, always leave the portal closed, this is all very well

title: (27880) Burela - 62 Camiño dos Romeos
description: Parking with sea views

title: (27880) Burela - 27 Rúa do Canabal
description: This is the new location of the Burela area. Services and parking in quiet street. The area in front of the hospital still maintains the services but they allow to park cars and if they are parked it is not possible to maneuver to leave.

title: (27880) Burela - 11 Rúa Pomeda
description: This place is on a street next to the beach. We are two cars at night, I can not be sure if there is a problem parking during the day, I do not see any sign that indicates it. Parking is online. No services for loading and unloading. Very quiet and safe place.

title: (27880) Burela - 18 Travesía Eijo Garay
description: Parking at the port, next to the fish market. Quite a few places, although they are for cars, we have spent the night only my AC and another van. There are no services, in front there are garbage cans and a soda machine.

title: (27880) Burela - 1 Rúa Uxío Novoneira
description: Great laundromat. Unfortunately the description is only in Spanish, it would also be in English or German. The laundry was nice and clean and smelled great. park 100m towards the Dia supermarket.

title: (27880) Burela - 50C Rúa Camiño Real
description: Wide Par Quin close to the center. Ideal for restaurants.

title: (15339) Ortigueira - 24 Rúa Xuncal
description: 6 car parks. leveled. with light. picnic tables. litter bins. very quiet at night and very close to the beach. the river runs just behind.

title: (27880) Burela - 12 Rúa do Porto
description: Puerto de Burela, quiet and central area.

title: (15339) O Porto de Espasante - 12D Praza de San Antonio
title_short: (15339) O Porto de Espasante - 12D Praza de San Antonio
description: Small free municipal asphalt parking, with a very clean public toilet booth and direct access to the beach with showers. For campers and small motorhomes.

title: (15339) O Porto de Espasante - 3 Estrada do Porto
title_short: (15339) O Porto de Espasante - 3 Estrada do Porto
description: Free land parking with water tap, very central, in high season it is better to use the port.

title: (27775) San Pedro de Mor - 20 CP-0202
description: Alfoz service area, with ample parking and located next to Campo de Fútbol a very quiet town, ideal for hiking and 25 km from the beach

title: (27880) Burela - 1 Avenida da Mariña
description: It's an ideal port, Burela, to practice fishing.

title: (15339) - 10 Estrada do Porto
description: Parking in the same port, with the beach next to it, with a shower and rubbish bins. In addition, next to the showers there is a threaded tap for drinking water. There is a restaurant in the port. The nearby town is pretty. Festivities of San Antonio in June, around the pig "antón".

title: (15339) Ortigueira - Cancelas
description: Beautiful place with spectacular views of the Ladrido estuary, quiet and with shower and water service. the only drawback is that it's a little slanted. but nice to spend the day fishing and even a few banks

title: (27880) Burela - 15 Rúa Torrentes
description: Good parking in front of the sea, stone tables and chairs, on the stairs of a small beach in the west there is a source of drinking water. We spent one night here in July. Very quiet place.

title: (15339) Ortigueira -
description: Nice view. Verry Quiet

title: (15339) Ortigueira - 1 Lugar Castros
description: In the years old picnic area, but in a fantastic and quiet location. Surrounded by eucalyptus and pine forest, shadows of some plane trees and two large palm trees. Several benches made of stone, also a tap is available. Access to the beach via small path in a few hundred meters. Recommended short circular route with a view of the sea. We use this place for a quiet night.

title: () O Mosteiro - Unnamed Road
description: There is access for a maximum of 2 vans, it is next to the estuary, a secluded and very quiet place, you can live the tides directly, and access the low seas to (look at) the native fauna.

title: (27892) Foz - 1 Estrada General Cangas
description: Quiet place where you can spend the night and day, tables to eat, leveled, with a playground and a field by the sea. A little further down there is a public water intake, but it is difficult to adapt a hose.

title: (27892) Cangas -
description: Esplanade behind the cemetery, super quiet place, with beautiful views of the cliffs. grass area

title: (15330) Ortigueira -
description: Flat quiet friendly corner near a mill

title: (15330) Ortigueira - 2 Lugar Lagarea
description: Traditional open spout fountain For charging, park with the side where you have the water inlet facing the fountain

title: (15330) Ortigueira - 135 AC-862
description: Ortigueira self-service laundry. Washing and drying. To wait for the washing time, across the street you have very beautiful views .

title: (15332) Ortigueira - CP-6114
description: Morouzos beach car park in Ortigueira. At the entrance of the car park there is a sign indicating the prohibition of camping due to the law of coasts. We have not spent the night but it is a great place to eat, with tables and lots of shade, a beach bar and next to the beach. On the second weekend of July they celebrate a Celtic music festival in Ortigueira and fans spend the night in this environment.

title: (15330) Ortigueira - 5 Calle Alameda
description: Perfect parking lot to sleep in, bars next to a good beer and very friendly and welcoming people, totally recommendable mixed parking lot. only suitable up to 6.70m.

title: (15330) Ortigueira - 3 Rúa do Malecón
description: The Ortigueira town hall has provided booths with bathrooms and hot showers completely free of charge. They have a plug. They are very clean.

title: (15330) Ortigueira - 15 Paseo Barro Soto
description: Service area without reserved spaces, to park there are three spaces in the parking lot next to the marina but they leave it in the pool parking lot while they create an area for motorhomes. The center of town is reached by the promenade which is a 5' walk away. The black water drain box is next to the gray grate on the floor and you have to move the motorhome to be able to use it and lift the lid. The grate next to the curb is for rainwater and goes directly into the estuary, so it cannot be used for black or gray water.

title: (15332) Ortigueira - 1 Rúa do Príncipe
description: spend a night Impressive views and level parking along the road with little traffic. After consultation with the tourist office it is allowed.

title: (27893) Foz - N-642
description: Near the beach and quiet, but has some inequalities. With bathrooms nearby and a walk

title: (15368) Ortigueira - 23 Lugar Trestemil
description: Small picnic area with a water tap and a barbecue. Several tables are available. In the shade to eat.

title: (27789) A Lousada -
description: Level parking. Near the beach and communicates with the natural path of the Cantabrian Route. Not recommended for very long motorhomes, access is narrow.

title: (27836) Muras - Unnamed Road
description: Very isolated place on a path which must be quite muddy in case of rain, but there is also a clearance at the edge of the tarmac road (narrow). Van only in my opinion. River not accessible but water flows over the road.

title: (27789) Foz - 2 Camiño Praia
description: Beach parking. it has water and showers. we spent one night here and it was very quiet. We had breakfast sitting in the castro and it was wonderful. many hikers pass by during the day. the beach has a lot of stones but it is good for bathing

title: (15369) Cariño - 3 DP-6121
description: Water tap

title: (15360) Cariño - 55 Rúa Manuel Fraga Iribarne
description: Parking at the entrance of the port. Quiet until 6:30 in the morning, when trucks begin to pass. The town is right next door with all kinds of services. There is a local bar nearby that opens early in the morning.

title: () Foz - Camiño Caldouceiro

description: In Tien21 they have spare parts for gas bottles.

description: Área gratuita

description:
Service with water and draining black and gray waters. 

Parking space not far away at the Cariño's football camp, less than a 1 km away.

title: (15360) Cariño - Avenida Paz
description: Promenade, parks for children, beach, showers and very friendly people, you can be in all the walk and even in the esplanade of the port, very nice town to visit and to taste typical seafood of the area. At the beginning of the walk there is an area to empty and fill.

title: (27787) Foz - Unnamed Road
description: Perfect parking to visit the Basilica of San Martiño de Mondoñedo. The oldest cathedral in Spain, located in Foz.

description: water point

title: (15340) Ortigueira - 16 Lugar Cereixal
description: Very quiet place, next to a paved road where cars hardly pass. 150m after crossing the river bridge there is a picnic area. It is a wonderful place where the Mera River divides in two, forming an island. Nature and tranquility guaranteed. possibility of walking route. Also ideal for a bike ride. Highly recommended.

title: (27787) Foz - Unnamed Road
description: O pico da lebre viewpoint, from where you can see the town of Foz and the mouth of its estuary to the Cantabrian Sea.

name: Camping San Rafael
title: (27789) Camping San Rafael
description: Family "Camping San Rafael" on the beach of Peizás. Quiet and clean place. showers included in price accept ACSI 2 people + camper + hot showers: 22,74€

title: (15365) O Pousadoiro -
description: Parking Mirador Da Miranda. Enclave in the middle of nature, quiet with amazing views of the Ría de Ortigueira and its adjoining towns. It has wooden tables, a level parking space and another for the disabled. Very quiet night in the middle of nature. Totally recommended.

title: (27789) Foz - 29 Avenida de Peizás
description: Parking in front of the beach. August 8 we found a place without problems. There are public toilets on the beach, which are good. They close at 7:30 p.m. Level Ground. To the center of Foz 30 minutes walking.

title: () Cariño - Unnamed Road
description:
Due to some gullies on the way, the area is only accessible to 4x4s or high wheeled vans.
In the middle of the ferns on a small pass.

title: (27789) Foz - 15 Camiño Forxán
description: Beach edge sanitary shelter tables small bay beach next door.

title: (27787) Foz - 4 Lugar Mourente
description: Recreational area with trees, tables and fountain.

title: (15360) Cariño - 1 Calle Cabo Ortegal
description: Location MAGNIFIQUE !!!!!! A must see. Parking where we can spend the night

title: (27787) Foz - Av. de Peizás
description: One of the many car parks on the coast. Very nice view, on the rocks near a beach, on the walking path.

title: (27787) Foz - Av. de Peizas
description: Parking on the edge of the cliff with a much better view than its little brother next door, but without the beach and services, without bins but without waste on the ground (very rare around here) so without the noisy parking lot of beach attendants. We are Sunday afternoon at the end of July, just tourists who pass by on foot and by bike, few in number.. the sound of the sea, that's all. I will spend the night there. The Guarda Civil makes crossings on the road at 200 meters. I think the same rules apply as for the beach parking next door. Without unpacking tables, camping chairs etc. it must be ok for 24, 48 hours. It's summer !

title: (27787) FOZ (Lugo) - Atalaia Camper Park (FOZ ) ctra general Forxan 2E
title_short: (27787) FOZ (Lugo) - Atalaia Camper Park  (FOZ )     ctra general Forxan 2E
description: Area with a multitude of services, large enclosed squares, power point, showers, washing machines, dryers, iron, wiffi, TV area and snacks, area for dogs, free bicycles, shopping service from the supermarket, daily bread and pastries service, very close to the center.

address.street: Atalaia Camper Park  (FOZ )     ctra general Forxan 2E

title: (27780) Foz - Camiño Forxán
description: Roadside little passer on grass, flat, alone in the quiet off season ... beach shower, easy access, beautiful setting with open views, walks and fishing.

title: (27780) Foz - 118 Avenida Ferreiro Rodríguez
description: Beach car park, empty out of season (end of November) facing the sea, beach shower nearby.

title: (15365) Cariño - DP-2205
description: Relatively flat parking lot where you could stay with about 10 campers. Directly along the road, but it is hardly driven.

title: (15365) Cariño - Unnamed Road
description: Grassy spot which should fit for 2 little caravans. Surrounded by nature, cows and wild horses. If you do not mind seeing (and maybe also hearing) wind generators, this is a good place for a night.

title: (27780) Foz - 35 Rúa Antón Vilar Ponte
description:
Self-service laundry 800 meters from the camper area.
Three washing machines of and three dryers.
Very spacious and clean laundry room.

title: (15365) Cariño - Unnamed Road
description: A grassy area at the edge of the road (very little traffic), one or two motorhomes possible, it is in the middle of nature with a view of the sea. Nearby, the limo viewpoint offers a beautiful view of Carino and the ria d'Ortegueira.

title: (27788) Foz -

title: (27780) Foz - 30 Rúa Corporacións Municipais
description: Self-service laundry. Open 08:00-22:00 365 days. Free parking on the street.

title: (27780) Foz - 20 Rúa Eduardo Pondal
description: Self-service laundry

title: () Foz - 6 Rúa do Ru Curbeiro

no services, only parking

title: (27747) O Vilar -

title: (15569) A Casilla - 2 AC-862

title: (27790) - 53P Lugar Viladaide

No is allowed out tables, chairs and other activities acampada.-

title: (15365) Cariño - 7 DP-2205

title_short: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 3 Poblado da Fraga
description: Green area on the bank of the River, a lot of flat parking but little shade in summer. Is very pretty

title: (15358) Cedeira - DP-2205
description: Beautiful spot! Small water point, wild horses, we could see a fox. a spot swept by the wind and quite cloudy, but it adds a part of mystic.

title: (27740) Mondoñedo - 9 Rúa Vicedo
description: Motorhome area in Mondoñedo. It is a large parking lot with the possibility of water change, both gray and black. It also has a tap for drinking water with a wire and a container. We didn't sleep but it looks very quiet and surrounded by shops.

title: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 110 Rúa Antonio Machado
title_short: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 110 Rúa Antonio Machado
description: Ugly but wide esplanade and very close to the motorhome area for the days of the flea market that cannot be in the area. from here there is a walk to get to the swamp. very good mobile coverage.

title: (27798) Vilamar - 8 Lugar Vilamar
description: Level place on completely flat cement. Surrounded by trees that cut the wind on bad days. Very calm. It has a playground, a couple of tables, a small shed and a lot of land, ideal for families and pets. It has drinking water and containers. There is a bar 200 meters away in the village. Please keep it clean.

title: (27740) Mondoñedo - 15 Rúa Leiras Pulpeiro
description: drinking fountain

Pet car wash with shampoo available, pet laundry, and vending machine with pipettes, leashes, etc.
Collection point for Amazon items.
Clothes laundry and coffee machine.

title: (27760) Lourenzá - 4 Estrada a Masma

title: (27740) Mondoñedo - 1 Rúa Pacheco

title: (27740) Mondoñedo - 7 Camino da Valada

title: (15565) As Somozas - 64 Rúa das Oliveiras
description: As Somozas is located at the eastern end of the province of A Coruña, which belongs to the comarca of Ferrol. The A Queiroga Recreation Area, on the banks of the Mera, is an appropriate spot for trout fishing and is also frequented by people looking to enjoy nature.

title: () As Pontes de García Rodríguez - Unnamed Road
title_short: () As Pontes de García Rodríguez - Unnamed Road
description: Plenty of parking spaces along the road leading to the lake. Many benches along the beach, it's super quiet. The view is beautiful. There is the possibility of doing water sports - style windsurfing and canoeing. The site closed at 11 p.m.

title: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - AC-101
title_short: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - AC-101

title: (15358) Cedeira - DP-2205

title: (15358) Santo André de Teixido - DP-2205
description: Comparatively windless parking lot diagonally opposite the Miradoiro Cruceiro. Fantastic sunset and thanks to the protective pine forest in the back, the wind blows across the course. Great for one night or as a starting point for hikes and a small via ferrata.

title: (27792) Barreiros - 48 LU-P-0610
description: Parking for day and night. Very quiet near the beach. A very large place.

name: Coto Camper
title: (27792) Coto Camper
description: Private area 100 meters from Coto Beach in Barreiros. 8 km from the beach of Las Catedrales. Area with all the services available on the land itself (water loading and emptying, as well as a 6 amp electrical outlet). Large plots with lawn. It has showers, a sink area and a laundry room. Very quiet place and close to gas station and supermarkets.

title: (15358) Cedeira - CP-2205
description: Free parking but steep, perfect to visit the famous village of San Andres de Texeiro, it is the road of the watchtowers and the places of bivouacs in full nature are numerous.  No service.

title: (27790) Barreiros -
description: Quiet place ... access by track in good condition ... with sustained incline.

title: (27835) Xermade - AG-64
description: Rest stop on Freeway. Large, flat, plenty of space. Might be noisy at night but easy stop for a rest.

title: (27792) Barreiros - 11 LU-P-0610
description: Free carpark on beach in front of formal campsite. Toilets, beach showers, water, bins, picnic benches in front of surf break. Would be a great place to wake up in.

name: A Gaivota Camping

Camping Poblado Gaivota, small campsite by the sea Beautiful views - perfect for a couple of relaxing days
Places well protected from the wind by high hedges
